{"step_by_step_thinking": "The child's symptoms of delayed walking, dental caries, frontal bossing, widened wrists, bowed legs, and beading of the ribs are all indicative of rickets, a condition caused by vitamin D deficiency that results in impaired growth plate mineralization. This is likely due to the child being exclusively breastfed without receiving any supplemental vitamin D.", "answer_choice": "C. Impaired growth plate mineralization"}
